SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing Long-Haul Operators relative to International Routes?
SRP.A: Long-Haul Operators is {below} International Routes in the vertical direction.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the largest portion to the total driver satisfaction?
VPR.A: The series with the largest contribution is {Last-Mile Couriers}.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the smallest portion to the total driver satisfaction?
VPR.A: The series with the smallest contribution is {International Routes}.

VE.A: Last-Mile Couriers's driver satisfaction in 1985 is {112.61} index.

VE.A: Drone Pilots's driver satisfaction in 1979 is {79.42} index.

VE.Q: What is Drone Pilots's Driver Satisfaction in 1986?
VE.A: Drone Pilots's driver satisfaction in 1986 is {61.98} index.

VE.Q: What are the driver satisfaction of International Routes, Drone Pilots, and Last-Mile Couriers in 1985?
VE.A: International Routes's driver satisfaction is {42.22} index, Drone Pilots's driver satisfaction is {63.66} index, Last-Mile Couriers's driver satisfaction is {112.61} index.

EVJ.Q: What is the global minimum Driver Satisfaction in the area chart?
EVJ.A: The global minimum driver satisfaction is {38.31} index.

EVJ.Q: What is the global maximum Driver Satisfaction in the area chart?

SC.Q: What is the average total Driver Satisfaction?
SC.A: The average total driver satisfaction is {304.20} index.

NC.Q: Was the total Driver Satisfaction in 1984 higher or lower than in 1986?
NC.A: The total driver satisfaction in 1984 was {lower} than in 1986.

NC.Q: Between 1981 and 1985, was the average total Driver Satisfaction higher or lower than between 1983 and 1986?
NC.A: The average total driver satisfaction between 1981 and 1985 was {lower} than between 1983 and 1986.

NC.Q: Was the total Driver Satisfaction in 1983 higher or lower than in 1986?
NC.A: The total driver satisfaction in 1983 was {lower} than in 1986.

NC.Q: Between 1982 and 1984, did the total Driver Satisfaction experience a larger or smaller change than between 1980 and 1981?
NC.A: The change in total driver satisfaction between 1982 and 1984 was {smaller} than between 1980 and 1981.

MSR.Q: Which series has the largest cumulative area in this area chart?
MSR.A: {Last-Mile Couriers} has the largest cumulative area.

VA.Q: To reduce the 'waving' visual effect in the area chart, reorder the layers by end value and list the labels from top to bottom after sorting.
VA.A: The reordered layer order from top to bottom is: {International Routes, Drone Pilots, Long-Haul Operators, Last-Mile Couriers}.
